messages.subject: need some gentle parenting help here
messages.msgSnippet: Keeping things nice will increase stress in yourself and your family. (How much will depend on the personalities of the family members and how much you enjoy
messages.messageBody:
"Keeping things nice will increase stress in yourself and your family. (How
much will depend on the personalities of the family members and how much you
enjoy maintenance.)"

I told my very neat and tidy dh about this conversation today...his response was "It basically comes down to this: you can have a nice house, or nice kids. One or the other, but not both"

I thought that was pretty good for a neat freak that has learned to adapt.:)

Ren


"There is no way to
peace. Peace is the way."
~Quaker saying
